app_descript:
App Name: Sudoku

Brief: Embark on a numerical adventure with the classic Sudoku puzzle-solving experience. Designed to challenge your logic and sharpen your mind, this app offers a traditional Sudoku game where the objective is to fill a grid with digits so that every column, row, and subgrid contains all the numbers from 1 to 9. It caters to both beginners and seasoned players, with a slew of features to enrich your puzzle experience.
